abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan supports a Government
            program to strengthen policies in the agriculture/livestock
            sector, with particular attention to eliminating price
            distortions and increasing export incentives.  Under the
            policy package supported by the loan, the Government would
            take additional steps to eliminate trade restrictions, to
            improve institutional support systems and rationalize
            regulatory procedures.  The project is designed to increase
            profitability in the sector, change farmers'
            expectations and bring about a more positive investment
            climate.  Achievement of these goals should, in turn, lead
            to higher productivity and exports.
